author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
We recently saw the release of Vulkan 1.4 and almost immediately after that we saw implementations dropping from every GPU driver project, but especially for those within Mesa, within 2 hours 5 PRs were opened.

title: Every GPU Driver Is Speedrunning Vulkan 1.4 Support
